name: BowBlade\u2014Where Video Gaming Meets Archery (Canceled)
blurb: The Bowblade combines resistive movement with video gaming creating a more immersive and physical gaming experience

rewards.reward: No Reward
Join the BowBlade movement! Get a special GAME ON sticker to badge you as a BowBlade Kickstarter backer. PLUS you'll get updates and be the first to know when we go live!
GAME ON: Get some gear to showoff your BowBlade Kickstarter backer status: Game On sticker + Tshirt! Both say [I Kickstarter'd This] to prove how awesome you are.
SWAG PACK: Get decked out in BowBlade gear! You get the Game On Sticker + Tshirt PLUS three 1" Buttons + a retractable keychain. Not to mention you have our eternal thanks!

EARLYBIRD! Be one of the first backers and get your very own BOWBLADE [It's Black with Blue grips] for our special intro price. SAVE $10! PLUS you'll get some mini-swag (sticker + button). But hurry, there's only 300 available! [Shipping to Canada add $10, International add $20 to pledge amount]

BOWBLADE: Get your Game On with your very own Classic Blue BowBlade! PLUS you'll get some mini-swag (sticker + button) to show off how awesome you are! [Shipping to Canada add $10, International add $20 to pledge amount]

BOWBLADE BUNDLE: Get an awesome Blue BowBlade PLUS a Bowometer to keep track of the hard work you do AND some kickass additional swag (sticker + button + keychain)! [Shipping to Canada add $10, International add $20 to pledge amount]

REVERSED BOWBLADE BUNDLE (exclusive): Get a wicked REVERSED BowBlade ONLY available on Kickstarter! [It's Blue with Black grips] PLUS you'll get a Bowometer AND that awesome Game On Tshirt! [Shipping to Canada add $10, International add $20 to pledge amount]

DOUBLE BOWBLADE BUNDLE: Got a friend/sister/brother/kids? Then you need this! Get TWO Blue BowBlades to have double the fun and SAVE $20! [2 Blue BowBlades + 2 Tshirts + 2 Keychains] [Shipping to Canada add $15, International add $25 to pledge amount]

GET LISTED: Be immortalized as a BowBlade Backer! We'll put your name in our manual and on our website so you can show the whole world. PLUS we'll give you a Double BowBlade Bundle (blue) AND include a Bowometer for each! [Shipping to Canada add $15, International add $25 to pledge amount]

DOUBLE REVERSED BOWBLADE BUNDLE: This is another Kickstarter Exclusive! Get TWO Reversed BowBlade Bundles (or ask for one classic Blue / one reversed Blue) and SAVE $30! [2 Reversed BowBlades + 2 Bowometers + 2 Tshirts] And just for being awesome, we'll also add your name to our manual and website. [Shipping to Canada add $15, International add $25 to pledge amount]

DO SOME GOOD: Join us in doing good! For each of these pledges, we will donate 2 BowBlades in your name to a hospital, rehab clinic, or school of your choice (in North America). PLUS you get everything in the Double Reversed Bowblade Bundle but on our Do-Gooders backer list! Make the world a better place, one BowBlade at a time! [Shipping to Canada add $15, International add $25 to pledge amount]

SPECIAL TREAT: Be our honored guest at FanExpo Canada 2013 in Toronto Aug. 23rd or 24th! We promise it's an awesome time. PLUS get an exclusive Double BowBlade Bundle (1 blue/1 reversed blue) to show off AND you'll be listed in our manual & website! [limited to 10. travel and stay not included.] [Shipping to Canada add $15, International add $25 to pledge amount]

ORANGE BOWBLADE BUNDLE: This is a serious limited-edition Kickstarter Exclusive (only 50 available!). Get a wicked ORANGE BowBlade AND have it personalized with ENGRAVING! You're name will be added to the Badass Backers list in our manual and website. You'll also get a personal thank you note from Dr. Ron. PLUS some mini-swag! [Shipping to Canada add $15, International add $25 to pledge amount]

SUPER SWEET:\r\nTake that DO SOME GOOD package and pile on the extras! We'll donate an additional TWO BowBlades with Bowometers (4 Total). Get your name on our Super Do-Gooders backers list AND you'll receive a personal thank you note from Dr.Ron. Best part: Get an invitation to launch party in Jan 2014 (if you can make it out)!! [2 Reversed BowBlades + 2 Bowometers + 2 Tshirts] [flight and stay not included] [Shipping to Canada add $15, International add $25 to pledge amount]

EPIC BACKER:\r\nGet everything in the Super Sweet package AND pick your choice of ANY of our three colors for your bundle! You'll get a personal phone call from Dr. Ron to thank you! In addition to your invite to launch party in Jan 2014, you get to attend our special Brainstorming Luncheon to help determine the future of BowBlade!! [2 BowBlades (any color) + 2 Bowometers + 2 Tshirts] [flight and stay not included]

ULTRA COOL:\r\nNot only will you be on our Epic Backers list, but you'll get an invitation to launch party in Jan 2014 AND attend our special Brainstorming Luncheon to help determine the future of BowBlade!! PLUS get TWO Double BowBlade Bundle with your choice of ANY of our three colors AND engraving! Add to that a pretty awesome swag package and our love forever! [flight and hotel not included]

GO VIRAL: Be a movie star! We'll shoot a new commercial for the BowBlade with you in it! This is an amazing opportunity for a budding actor/actress. [Must be between 13-22 years of age and have parental permission!] We'll pay your travel expenses [within North America only] AND of course you'll get to be listed on our Star Badass list! PLUS get a Double BowBlade Bundle in any color. Don't miss the chance to be the next face of BowBlade!

VIP BACKER:

You are a rockstar! Get a VIP invite to launch party in Jan 2014, an invite to the Brainstorming luncheon AND a one-on-one info session with Dr. Ron! [flight included within North America, hotel not included] Of course, you also get TWO Double BowBlade Bundle with your choice of ANY of our three colors and engraving! And you'll be on our VIP Backers list!

PLUS for added feel-good, we will kickstart a school P.E. program with a donation of 10 BowBlades made in your name!

MVP BACKER: You are clearly the biggest badass in the room! Get everything VIP but on a whole new level. You'll get an MVP invite to our launch party [flight + hotel included] where you'll be treated like royalty PLUS a special MVP dinner the night before! Did we mention we'll love you forever? We will.
